name: mt_MAT_00_Extract_PRDCT_XREF
description: @connectionSource= MDM Hosted, @connectionTarget= S3 Bucket, @transformation= Read MSTR XREF table from MDM and write in S3 Bucket, @dataType= XREF table, @sources=[@connection1= ORC_HMDM_READ_MATERIALS], @targets=[@connection1= S3_HMDM_V2_HostedAgent], @description= Mapping task for DL Extract

parameters.name: $Src_MDM_S3$
parameters.label: Conn_MDM (Conn_MDM)
parameters.customQuery:
SELECT 
xref.PKEY_SRC_OBJECT AS ITEM_SKEY,
xref.MTRL_IDNTFR AS PRODUCT_IDENTIFIER,
xref.OVRLL_MTRL_TYP AS OVERALL_ITEM_TYPE,
xref.MTRL_TYP AS ITEM_TYPE,
xref.CHAMP_CD AS CHAMP_CODE,
xref.PRDCT_CTGR AS PRODUCT_CATEGORY,
xref.TCHNLG_GRP AS TECHNOLOGY_GROUP,
xref.PRDCT_HRCHY AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY,
xref.PRDCT_TYPE AS PRODUCT_TYPE,
xref.BS_UNT_MSR AS BASE_UNIT_OF_MEASURE,
xref.DVSN AS BU,
xref.SBU_DVSN AS SBU,
xref.STATUS_CD AS PRODUCT_STATUS,
xref.ORGNTNG_ID AS ORIGINATING_IDENTIFIER,
xref.SRC_SYSTM_ID AS ORIGINATING_SYSTEM,
xref.NW_PRDCT_LNCH_DT AS NEW_PRODUCT_LAUNCH_DATE,
xref.ITM_EXST_SRC AS ITEM_EXISTS_IN_SOURCE,
xref.CREATOR,
to_Char(xref.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') as CREATE_DATE,
xref.UPDATED_BY,
to_Char(xref.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') as LAST_UPDATE_DATE 
FROM MATERIALS_HUB.C_BO_PRDCT_MSTR mstr
INNER JOIN MATERIALS_HUB.C_BO_PRDCT_MSTR_XREF xref ON MSTR.ROWID_OBJECT  = xref.ROWID_OBJECT 
WHERE xref.ROWID_SYSTEM <> 'SYS0'

inOutParameters.name: p_Src_MDM
inOutParameters.currentValue: SELECT xref.PKEY_SRC_OBJECT AS ITEM_SKEY, xref.MTRL_IDNTFR AS PRODUCT_IDENTIFIER, xref.OVRLL_MTRL_TYP AS OVERALL_ITEM_TYPE, xref.MTRL_TYP AS ITEM_TYPE, xref.CHAMP_CD AS CHAMP_CODE, xref.PRDCT_CTGR AS PRODUCT_CATEGORY, xref.TCHNLG_GRP AS TECHNOLOGY_GROUP, xref.PRDCT_HRCHY AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY, xref.PRDCT_TYPE AS PRODUCT_TYPE, xref.BS_UNT_MSR AS BASE_UNIT_OF_MEASURE, xref.DVSN AS BU, xref.SBU_DVSN AS SBU, xref.STATUS_CD AS PRODUCT_STATUS, xref.ORGNTNG_ID AS ORIGINATING_IDENTIFIER, xref.SRC_SYSTM_ID AS ORIGINATING_SYSTEM, xref.NW_PRDCT_LNCH_DT AS NEW_PRODUCT_LAUNCH_DATE, xref.ITM_EXST_SRC AS ITEM_EXISTS_IN_SOURCE, xref.CREATOR, to_Char(xref.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') as CREATE_DATE, xref.UPDATED_BY, to_Char(xref.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') as LAST_UPDATE_DATE FROM MATERIALS_HUB.C_BO_PRDCT_MSTR mstr INNER JOIN MATERIALS_HUB.C_BO_PRDCT_MSTR_XREF xref ON MSTR.ROWID_OBJECT = xref.ROWID_OBJECT WHERE xref.ROWID_SYSTEM <> 'SYS0' AND xref.last_update_date> TO_TIMESTAMP('29-05-25 00:00:00.000','DD-MM-YY HH24:MI.SSXFF')
